name: Color Picker
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description:
When we select a color in the backend from the color picker the text in the frontend shows the selected color.

This is free plugin with link of company website in footer.
If you want to remove link, please buy pro version from iFour Technolab.
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin and unzip it to your /wp-content/plugins/ plugin directory.
  2. After that go to your plug-in manager and activate it.
  3. After activate Color Picker on any page Go to SETTING menu and select color.
sections.faq:
1. It is free ?
    Yes.- Color Picker is totaly free and there is no extra charges for used this plugin
  2. It is Configurable ?
    Yes.- Color Picker is configurable from admin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Download plugin and unzip it to your /wp-content/plugins/ plugin directory.
  2. After that go to your plug-in manager and activate it.
  3. After activate Color Picker on any page Go to SETTING menu and select color.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Color Picker on any page is ready for production
